SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_SPONSORSHIP_CANCEL_SPONSORSHIP_CONSTITUENCYCODES
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Ends the sponsorship type constituency codes for a given sponsorship
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIP_CANCEL_SPONSORSHIP_CONSTITUENCYCODES ( @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier ) as begin -- sets the DATETO=today of the constituency code record that matches the -- constituentid and either of the constituency codes: Prospect Sponsor or Sponsor update dbo.CONSTITUENCY set DATETO = GETDATE() where CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID and CONSTITUENCYCODEID IN ( select ID from dbo.CONSTITUENCYCODE where LOWER([Description]) IN (LOWER('Prospect Sponsor'), LOWER('Sponsor')) )
end
